plot: A hard-cutting dramatic monologue through which the protagonist (Johnny) tells of his exploits as a car thief. The first of a trilogy of short films set and shot in Port Talbot.
title: Pocket Money
plot_es: A hard-cutting dramatic monologue through which the protagonist (Johnny) tells of his exploits as a car thief. The first of a trilogy of short films set and shot in Port Talbot.
